statements: SELECT * FROM user_auth;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_auth;
SELECT * FROM user_auth WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_auth ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_auth WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_auth WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_auth WHERE last_login >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_auth WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_auth ORDER BY last_login ASC, user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM user_auth GROUP BY username HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email NOT LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 3 AND login_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY last_activity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles UR JOIN user_role_mappings URMap ON UR.role_id = URMap.role_id WHERE URMap.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mappings ON users.user_id = user_role_mappings.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mappings.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_roles FROM users JOIN user_role_mappings ON users.user_id = user_role_mappings.user_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_roles > 1;
SELECT * FROM auth_users LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM auth_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email FROM auth_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT permission_name FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM auth_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM auth_users WHERE password_hash = 'hashedpassword123';
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT permission_name FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT a.username, b.role_name FROM auth_users a JOIN user_roles b ON a.user_id = b.role_id WHERE a.user_id = 1;
